H0.text: Geoff Capes, twice the world's strongest man, won 2 Olympic Games gold medals in which sport. Weightlifting

H1.text: Geoff Capes, twice the world's strongest man, won 2 Olympic Games gold medals in which sport. Discus Throw

H2.text: Geoff Capes, twice the world's strongest man, won 2 Olympic Games gold medals in which sport. Javelin Throw

H3.text: Geoff Capes, twice the world's strongest man, won 2 Olympic Games gold medals in which sport. Shotput

A4.text: He eventually placed fifth, the winner being Vladimir Kiselyov
